price: ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߣߊ߬ ߘߐ߬ߛߊߙߌ ߘߐ߬ߣߍ߲߬ߘߐ߬ߣߍ߲߬ ߠߊ߬ߖߌ߮ ߞߍ߫ ߟߴߌ ߡߊ߬ ߕߎߜߍ߫
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِيلٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā ʿalayka al-qur'āna tanzīlan
